text: Ārau tē'ōm̐ka banī icharaā'īlara bābē raāchulasbaraūpē (praēraṇa karaiba, tē'ōm̐ ka’ba) ‘niścaẏa ma'i tōmālōkara pratipālakara taraphara paraā tōmālōkara ōcarata nidarśana lai āhichō yē, niścaẏa ma'i tōmālōkara bābē bōkā māṭira dbāraā ēṭā caraā'i sadr̥śa ākr̥ti gaṭhana karaima; tāra pichata tāta ma'i phum̐ dima; phalata āllāhara ādēśata sē'iṭō caraā'i hai yāba; lagatē ma'i āllāhara ādēśata janmāndha ārau kuṣṭha byādhigrastha lōkaka niraāmaẏa karaima ārau mr̥taka jīraita karaima. Tōmālōkē nijara gharata yi khōraā ārau yi sañcaẏa karaā sēẏā'ō ma'i tōmālōkaka janā'i dima. Niścaẏa iẏāta tōmālōkara bābē nidarśana āchē yadi tōmālōkē mumina hōraā’
